title: Alex Palou was ready to give up on IndyCar to be F1 reserve driver
summary: IndyCar champion Alex Palou insists Formula 1 continues to be his "dream" and admits he was ready to give up on his drive in the American series

qa_pairs.question: Which racing series did Alex Palou win a championship in?
What role was Alex Palou considering in Formula 1?
What has Alex Palou described Formula 1 as?
